p: Participants in all groups will receive conventional Western medical treatments as recommended by the Guidelines of Chinese Society of Clinical Oncology: Prevention and treatment of nausea and vomiting caused by antitumor therapies, [ 21] including 5-HT3 receptor antagonist, NK-1 receptor antagonist, dexamethasone, and so on. In addition to conventional treatment, patients in Group A and Group B will receive AA or EA regimens, alternatively.
